attributes.action: Introduce Community Work for Benefit Claimants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure all fit and able-bodied unemployment benefit claimants attend a designated centre from 9am to 5pm, Monday to Friday, and work on community projects.  This would stop claimants from working in the "black economy" whilst claiming and also get them used to getting up in the mornings and going to a place of work for the day instead of doing nothing.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Introduce Community Work for Benefit Claimants."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11370.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Unemployment/
